trans-unit.source: See the trolley kids sing and dance their way down the street.
trans-unit.target: trolley kids bom 'ej mI' Qorwagh tInwI' street vIlegh.

trans-unit.source: Dressed in costumes from a bygone era, 12 performers ride a trolley until it stops for them to break out in song and dance. They put on show for whoever is wandering the street.
trans-unit.target: paH qaStaHvIS jech vo' bov bygone, trolley lIgh 12 performers until chaHvaD ghor qaStaHvIS bom je mI' mev 'oH. tuQmoH chaH cha' street wandering whoever.

trans-unit.source: Bursting with excitement, they belt out tunes such as "The Most Magical Place on Earth," "Walkin' Right Down the Middle of Main Street, U.S.A." and “The Trolley Song"—all seamlessly strung together and choreographed to lively dance routines.
trans-unit.target: bursting je excitement, qogh chaH loQ ghogh, vIghaj 'e' such as "HochHom Magical Daq tera'." "yIt lugh tInwI' potlhmo' Street, u.s.a. botlh" 'ej "Trolley bom" — Hoch seamlessly nItebHa' SIrgh ghajHa'ghach lively mI' routines choreographed je.

trans-unit.source: So, stop when the trolley stops and be dazzled by the show!
trans-unit.target: vaj mev HeghDI' mev 'ej dazzle trolley pong cha'!

trans-unit.source: Enjoy the sweet sounds of their singing.
trans-unit.target: vaj mev HeghDI' mev 'ej dazzle trolley pong cha'!

trans-unit.source: Gather 'round when the Dapper Dans come to town, the finest barbershop quartet in a 2-block radius! Wearing their colorful pinstriped suits, straw hats and taps, this 4-man group sings a soulful a cappella Americana and Disney tunes. Add tap dancing and “pun”-forgettable vaudeville humor, and you have an act the whole family will enjoy!
trans-unit.target: ghom round ghorgh lughoS Dapper dan veng SuvwI', finest barbershop quartet neH 2-bot radius! chaH colorful pinstriped suits, straw mIv 'ej taps tuQ, americana 'ej disney loQ ghogh vIghaj 'e' bom soulful cappella ghom 4-loD. tap dancing 'ej "pun" chel-'AY' 'e' tIv qorDu' naQ ghajbogh forgettable vaudeville humor 'ej!

trans-unit.source: Move it and shake it with Judy and Nick.
trans-unit.target: 'oH vIH 'ej 'oH shake judy nick je.

trans-unit.source: Brush up on your dance moves, grab your camera and get ready to raise the roof at the most awesome bash ever!
trans-unit.target: brush mI' vIH, mIllogh qonwI' grab 'ej yIghuS qabDaj 'ach awesome bash pep reH beb!

trans-unit.source: You'll want to party it up when you see giant gift boxes circle in front of Cinderella Castle — their presence means the shindig is about to begin. Use your camera to capture yourself as you bust a move in the middle of the celebration. And be sure to use the tag #MoveitShakeitPics on your posts to keep the digital party going!
trans-unit.target: 'oH ghom woDDI' ghorgh giant nob boxes gho in front of cinderella pa' Dalegh DaneH'a' — shindig jIqapruppu': tagh, qatlh qej presence. mIllogh qonwI' DanoHmeH jon Hoch vIH qaStaHvIS botlh lopno' bust SoH. 'ej be 'oH 'e' maq per #moveitshakeitpics DanoHmeH posts digital ghom ghoS pol!

trans-unit.source: Make way for the horseless carriage! And say "How d'you do" to some of the most fascinating folks you'll ever meet. Smartly stylish in their early 20th-century finery, these larger-than-life small-town denizens can be spotted along Main Street throughout the day.
trans-unit.target: horseless lengmeH mIw chenmoH! jatlh "Dotlh d'you" 'op 'ach vuQ 'aqla' reH ghom SoH. smartly stylish neH 'eq 20th vatlh DIS finery, laH chaDo'maq weghbogh-law'-yIn mach-veng SuvwI' denizens along potlhmo' Street qaStaHvIS jaj 'u'.
trans-unit.note: Description about citizens of main street.

trans-unit.source: They're always charmed to make your acquaintance and to bend your ear with the latest local scuttlebutt. You might even be treated to a rousing recital from the Main Street choir. And don't forget your new-fangled camera. These Citizens will be "pleased as punch" to pose for pictures.
trans-unit.target: chaH reH wejpuH ghotvam mIghqu' chenmoH je scuttlebutt latest lutu'lu'bej je teS SIH. chaq vabDot treated SoH lengHa'taHvIS recital vo' potlhmo' Street choir. ej Qo' chu'-fangled mIllogh qonwI'. nIb law' rewbe' ghaH "bel je HaSta" lol mIllogh.
trans-unit.note: Description about meeting citizens of main street.

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Main Street U.S.A. in the Magic Kingdom! There is so much to see and do here, so use this guide to get you started. Select one of the above items to read more about what Main Street has to offer.
trans-unit.target: majQa' potlhmo' Street u.s.a. neH Magic Qun'a' wo'! tu'lu' vIweghlI'meH vIlegh 'ej naDev Qu', vaj Dev DanoHmeH SoH started Suq.

trans-unit.source: Just around the corner is a Fantasyland.
trans-unit.target: neH around jIba'laH Fantasyland.

trans-unit.source: See all your friends sing, dance, and let it go.
trans-unit.target: Hoch bom, mI', 'ej loj rIntaH Dapeghchugh je legh.

trans-unit.source: This summer, skip-a-dee-doo-dah to the Cinderella Castle Forecourt stage for the fairest faire of them all!
trans-unit.target: poH tuj bI'reS, skip--dee-doo-Activate transport beam cinderella pa' Forecourt mIw fairest faire Hoch jatlh!

trans-unit.source: It takes a whole enchanted kingdom to put on this all-new, live stage show at Magic Kingdom park—and you’re cordially invited! In preparation for this joyous festival, Mickey and friends have ventured far and wide to gather Disney pals from all over to star in a royal friendship faire.
trans-unit.target: toDlu'meH enchant Qun'a' wo' tuQmoH Hoch-chu', mIw cha' DeSDu' Magic Qun'a' wo' park yIn tlhap 'oH — 'ej cordially vItlhobqa' SoH! qaStaHvIS ram Qu'maj mung je joyous yupma', disney maqoch ghom vo' Hoch rIn Hov neH royal Qu' faire ventured Hop je juppu'DajvaD mickey juppu' je.

trans-unit.source: Goofy has invited Tiana and friends from the Land of the Bewitching Bayous to infuse a little spice of New Orleans jazz in the party. Donald Duck brings some new friends he met at the Snuggly Duckling from the Land of Enchanted Woods to shake their tail feathers. Daisy has asked Rapunzel and Flynn to “comb” over and sing along. Mickey even recruited Olaf, Anna and Elsa from the Land of the Mystic Mountains to cast some extra cool touches!
trans-unit.target: tiana je jup vo' puH Bewitching Bayous loQ spice chu' orleans jazz neH ghom infuse Hochra' goofy. jup chu' qem donald Duck DeSDu' snuggly Duckling vo' puH Enchanted woods shake tlhuQ bo ghom. rapunzel 'ej flynn "jIb Ho'Du'" rIn 'ej bom along ghelta' daisy. olaf, anna je vo' Mystic HuD puH elsa Hot DuywI' cool woDlu'chugh vabDot ghuv mickey!

trans-unit.source: This grand affair culminates in the joining of classic and contemporary Disney Characters in a spectacular show featuring lively dancing, dazzling effects, an original song and memorable music from The Princess and the Frog, Tangled and Frozen.
trans-unit.target: qaStaHvIS muv classic 'ej contemporary disney vuDmey'e' neH spectacular cha' culminates vIpoSmoHmeH Qu'mey feature lively mI', dazzle 'angbogh Da, original bom 'ej memorable QoQ Princess frog, Tangled 'ej taD 'ej.
trans-unit.note: Description about end of stage show.
